Description.Text: Hotel Lan Kwai Fong Macau is conveniently located in the popular Macau City area. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Casino, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, valet parking are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk, mini bar, blackout curtains. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, spa, massage, steamroom. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Macau has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel Lan Kwai Fong Macau.
